TITLE.P: Project technical documentation for closed swiming pool in Smederevo

SHORT_DESCR.P: Technical documentation with all its necessary studies, annexes and technical control will be obtained by external service which will be contracted through tender procedure.
— dimensions of pool 25x33 m (with separate pool for non-swimmers dimensions 8x25 m and with smaller outdoor pool next to the facility),
— gross building area in basic: approximately 4 000 — 4 500 m2,
— number of floors: Po + P + 1 (underground level, ground level and floor — on the part of the surface), max. height to 10 m.
International restricted tender procedure for services.

INFO_ADD.P: The procurement procedure is in line with PRAG, version 2015.0 (The Practical Guide explains contracting procedures for EU external aid contracts financed by the EU general budget (Budget) and the 10th European Development Fund (EDF)).

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: Economic and financial capacity of candidate (based on Item 3 of the application form).
Criteria for legal and natural persons:

1. the average annual turnover of the candidate must exceed the annualised maximum budget of the contract (i.e., the maximum budget stated in the contract notice divided by the initial contract duration in years, where this exceeds 1 year); and
2. current ratio (current assets/current liabilities) in the last year for which accounts have been closed must be at least 1. In case of a consortium this criterion must be fulfilled by each member.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Technical capacity of candidate (based on Items 5 and 6 of the application form). The reference period which will be taken into account will be the last 3 years from submission deadline.
Criteria for legal and natural persons:

1. The candidate has provided services under at least 1 contract with a budget of at least that of 35 % of this contract in fields adequately to the services to be contracted — Study of geomechanical investigations, Elaborate of hydrological tests, Project for reconstruction of hydro-technical facility on the river bank, Study of the protection of cultural property of exceptional importance, which was/were implemented at any moment during the reference period.

2. The candidate has provided services under at least 1 contract with a budget of at least that of 65 % of this contract in fields adequately to the services to be contracted - Preliminary design of the indoor pool, Feasibility Study, Building Permit Project, Project for constructing, which was/were implemented at any moment during the reference period.
Professional capacity of candidate (based on Items 4 and 5 of the application form). The reference period which will be taken into account will be the last three years from submission deadline.
Criteria for legal and natural persons:
1. The candidate has a professional certificate appropriate to this contract, such as:

— decision on the fulfilment of the conditions for the development of technical documentation for the facilities for which the building permit is issued by the Ministry of Construction, Transport and Infrastructure,
— Authority of the Ministry of Internal Affairs for the preparation of the Main Fire Protection Project.
2. At least 5 permanent staff or contracted to work for the candidates in fields related to this contract such as:
— a graduated Civil Engineer — (structural designer of building structures) — (a hydraulic construction designer) — (construction designer of civil engineering objects),
— a graduated Mechanical Engineer — (designer of mechanical installations hydraulic and hydropower) — (thermo-technical, thermo-energetic, process and gas energy engineer),

— a graduated Electrical Engineer — (low and medium voltage electrical and power plant designer) — (telecommunications network and system designer) — (electric motors control Engineer — automation, measurement and regulation),

— a graduate Engineer of Geology — (a designer on the development of geotechnical and engineering chemistry backgrounds) — (designer on the development of hydro geological substrates), responsible engineer for building energy efficiency, authorized designer for the development of a fire protection project.
